definitions.example: Summer seems to last longer each year.

definitions.definition: To hold out, continue undefeated or entire.
definitions.example: I don't know how much longer we can last without reinforcements.

definitions.definition: To shape with a last; to fasten or fit to a last; to place smoothly on a last.
The action or state of persisting; the time during which something or someone persists.
A durable woollen material formerly used for women's shoes.
The act or process of shaping footwear on a last.
Persisting for an extended period of time.
definitions.example: After World War I it was hoped that a lasting peace had been achieved. It hadn’t.
